remarks.text: Auf den Linien S3, S4 und S5 kommt es zwischen Bad Soden(Taunus), Frankfurt(Main)Süd, Kronberg(Taunus), Friedrichsdorf(Taunus) und Frankfurt-Rödelheim vom 31.10.25 bis zum 03.12.25, zu Zugausfällen. Der Grund sind Bauarbeiten. Im Zeitraum vom 31.10.2025 (21:00 Uhr) - 07.11.2025 (04:00 Uhr) verkehrt die Linie S5 zwischen Frankfurt(Main)Süd und Frankfurt-Rödelheim im 30-Min-Takt. Es besteht kein Zugverkehr zwischen Frankfurt-Rödelheim und Friedrichsdorf(Taunus). Auf dem jeweils ausfallenden Abschnitt haben wir für Sie einen Ersatzverkehr mit Bussen eingerichtet. Die Mitnahme von Fahrrädern im Bus ist ausgeschlossen. Bitte informieren Sie sich frühzeitig über Ihre geplanten Verbindungen und wählen Sie gegebenenfalls eine frühere Zugverbindung, um Ihre Anschlüsse an Ihren Umsteigebahnhöfen erreichen zu können. Die Fahrplanänderungen zu dieser Baumaßnahme sind in die Online-Fahrplanauskünfte eingearbeitet.
Komfort Check-in possible (visit bahn.de/kci for more information)

tickets.name: Super Sparpreis
tickets.addDataTicketDetails: You can use all trains indicated on your ticket. Your ticket constitutes a continuous contract of carriage in each direction (through ticket). Should you make a passenger rights claim, the ticket will be considered in its entirety. Special rules apply to tickets including City-Ticket, see there. Your ticket cannot be cancelled. Your ticket includes a City-Ticket for Frankfurt(Main) in Stadtgebiet Frankfurt ohne Flughafen (Tarifgebiet 50 ohne Flughafen). The City-Ticket is valid in conjunction with your long-distance ticket only when you use it for connecting services in local or regional rail passenger transport (e.g. S-Bahn, RE and RB trains) as part of the through ticket. The City-Ticket is issued together with your Super Sparpreis or Sparpreis ticket, depending on the journey you have booked.

tickets.name: Super Sparpreis
tickets.addDataTicketInfo: Train selection. Cancellation. City-Ticket. No access to the DB Lounge
tickets.addDataTicketDetails: You can use all trains indicated on your ticket. Your ticket constitutes a continuous contract of carriage in each direction (through ticket). Should you make a passenger rights claim, the ticket will be considered in its entirety. Special rules apply to tickets including City-Ticket, see there. Your ticket cannot be cancelled. Your ticket includes a City-Ticket for Frankfurt(Main) in Stadtgebiet Frankfurt ohne Flughafen (Tarifgebiet 50 ohne Flughafen). The City-Ticket is valid in conjunction with your long-distance ticket only when you use it for connecting services in local or regional rail passenger transport (e.g. S-Bahn, RE and RB trains) as part of the through ticket. The City-Ticket is issued together with your Super Sparpreis or Sparpreis ticket, depending on the journey you have booked. Your ticket does not entitle you to use the DB Lounge.

tickets.name: Sparpreis
tickets.addDataTicketDetails: You can use all trains indicated on your ticket. Your ticket constitutes a continuous contract of carriage in each direction (through ticket). Should you make a passenger rights claim, the ticket will be considered in its entirety. Special rules apply to tickets including City-Ticket, see there. You can cancel your ticket up to and including 03.11.2025 for a fee of EUR 10,00. You will receive a voucher for the remaining amount. No cancellation thereafter. Your ticket includes a City-Ticket for Frankfurt(Main) in Stadtgebiet Frankfurt ohne Flughafen (Tarifgebiet 50 ohne Flughafen). The City-Ticket is valid in conjunction with your long-distance ticket only when you use it for connecting services in local or regional rail passenger transport (e.g. S-Bahn, RE and RB trains) as part of the through ticket. The City-Ticket is issued together with your Super Sparpreis or Sparpreis ticket, depending on the journey you have booked.

tickets.name: Sparpreis
tickets.addDataTicketInfo: Train selection. Cancellation. City-Ticket. No access to the DB Lounge
tickets.addDataTicketDetails: You can use all trains indicated on your ticket. Your ticket constitutes a continuous contract of carriage in each direction (through ticket). Should you make a passenger rights claim, the ticket will be considered in its entirety. Special rules apply to tickets including City-Ticket, see there. You can cancel your ticket up to and including 03.11.2025 for a fee of EUR 10,00. You will receive a voucher for the remaining amount. No cancellation thereafter. Your ticket includes a City-Ticket for Frankfurt(Main) in Stadtgebiet Frankfurt ohne Flughafen (Tarifgebiet 50 ohne Flughafen). The City-Ticket is valid in conjunction with your long-distance ticket only when you use it for connecting services in local or regional rail passenger transport (e.g. S-Bahn, RE and RB trains) as part of the through ticket. The City-Ticket is issued together with your Super Sparpreis or Sparpreis ticket, depending on the journey you have booked. Your ticket does not entitle you to use the DB Lounge.

tickets.name: Flexpreis
tickets.addDataTicketDetails: Your ICE ticket lets you take any type of train. Your ticket constitutes a continuous contract of carriage in each direction (through ticket). Should you make a passenger rights claim, the ticket will be considered in its entirety. Special rules apply to tickets including City-Ticket; see there. You can cancel your ticket free of charge up to and including 03.11.2025. After that, cancellation is available for a fee of EUR 30,00. Your ticket includes a City-Ticket for Frankfurt(Main), Stadtgebiet Frankfurt ohne Flughafen (Tarifgebiet 50 ohne Flughafen) and Dresden, Stadtgebiet Dresden (Tarifzone 10 Dresden). The City-Ticket is valid in conjunction with your long-distance ticket only when you use it for connecting services in local or regional rail passenger transport (e.g. S-Bahn, RE and RB trains) as part of the through ticket. The City-Ticket is issued together with your Super Sparpreis or Sparpreis ticket, depending on the journey you have booked.

tickets.name: Flexpreis
tickets.addDataTicketInfo: Train selection. Cancellation. City-Ticket. Access to the DB Lounge. Seat
tickets.addDataTicketDetails: Your ICE ticket lets you take any type of train. Your ticket constitutes a continuous contract of carriage in each direction (through ticket). Should you make a passenger rights claim, the ticket will be considered in its entirety. Special rules apply to tickets including City-Ticket; see there. You can cancel your ticket free of charge up to and including 03.11.2025. After that, cancellation is available for a fee of EUR 30,00. Your ticket includes a City-Ticket for Frankfurt(Main), Stadtgebiet Frankfurt ohne Flughafen (Tarifgebiet 50 ohne Flughafen) and Dresden, Stadtgebiet Dresden (Tarifzone 10 Dresden). The City-Ticket is valid in conjunction with your long-distance ticket only when you use it for connecting services in local or regional rail passenger transport (e.g. S-Bahn, RE and RB trains) as part of the through ticket. The City-Ticket is issued together with your Super Sparpreis or Sparpreis ticket, depending on the journey you have booked. Your ticket entitles you to use the DB Lounge. Your ticket includes a free seat reservation.
